mapper.select: select rn, no, type, title, hit, regDate, admin, manage, content from(select rownum rn, no, type, title, hit, regDate, admin, manage, content from (select no, type, title, hit, to_char(regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate, admin, manage, content from notice order by no desc)) where rn >= #{sNum} and rn <= #{eNum}
mapper.insert: insert into notice values( seq_notice_no.nextval, #{notiDetail}, #{title}, 0, sysdate, 'spotmate', '', #{content} )
mapper.select: select admin, to_char(regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate, type, title, content, hit from notice where no = #{noticeNo}
